description: An AI-powered website generator using Next.js and Strapi CMS

instructions: Copy .env.example to .env in both backend and frontend directories
Fill in the necessary environment variables in both .env files

appStore.name: Cloud SaaS Website Generator
appStore.shortDescription: Create professional websites with AI-powered content generation.
appStore.longDescription: Cloud SaaS Website Generator is an innovative tool that allows users to create stunning, SEO-optimized websites with ease. Leveraging the power of AI, it generates custom content based on user inputs, and provides a range of professional templates to choose from. Perfect for small businesses, freelancers, and entrepreneurs looking to establish a strong online presence quickly and efficiently.

price.details: Free plan available. Premium plans start at $9.99/month.

pluginMarket.name: AI Website Builder
pluginMarket.description: Integrate AI-powered website generation into your existing CMS or web application.
pluginMarket.installation: Follow the installation steps provided in the project's README.md file.
pluginMarket.configuration: After installation, navigate to the plugin settings in your CMS and enter your API credentials.
pluginMarket.usage: Use the provided shortcodes or blocks to embed the website generator functionality into your pages or posts.

extensionMarket.name: Website Generator Pro
extensionMarket.description: Create professional websites directly from your browser with AI-assisted content generation.
installationSteps: Download the extension from the marketplace
Click 'Add to Browser' or drag the file into your browser's extension page
extensionMarket.usage: Click on the extension icon in your browser to open the website generator interface.
extensionMarket.privacyInfo: This extension does not collect any personal data. All generated content is processed securely in the cloud.
